name: My Cat's Big Day.
description:
My Cat's Big Day is a short, quirky puzzle game where you play a CAT!

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 - Let there be Chaos.  Featuring: 

- Several Main story quests and side quests

 - Multiple short gags and secrets

 - Any% and 100% speedrunning

 -The lowest poly objects you've seen!

This game was made with love by Will

Thank you for playing  my first game <3
